name: M.A.R.S. Extraction
description:
The Game Story

Note that the story is changed a bit in the upcoming Remaster version.

You are a resistant of the resistance group M.A.R.S. [Mars Active Resistance Squad], you must steal the plans of the Olympus mount base to prevent a war against the Earth. You and your antigrav bike are the best for this type of mission.

Gameplay

This game is a six degrees of freedom shooter inspired by Forsaken and Descent. You must take advantages of your zero gravity bike to solve and complete the levels. Start with a simple laser and grab more weapons to become a real war machine! Translations available in English and French!

Remaster

All paid users have acccess to M.A.R.S. Extraction 2.0 Remaster. It's an enhanced version with more content (levels, story, etc.) and definitly better graphics. It's optimized for VR with new confort options.

Built for Virtual Reality

The game supports 4 types of HMD

  1. OSVR HMDs
  2. Oculus Rift
  3. OpenVR (HTC Vive)
  4. Google Cardboard
  5. Gear VR
Controls

You can play with a gamepad or a keyboard and a mouse. On mobile, it's strongly recommanded to use a bluetooth or USB controller but a touch controller is enabled by default if no gamepad is connected.

The ALPHA version allows you to play using a 3DRudder or your VR controllers.

Free vs Paid

The Free version is a demo that contains three levels, ads, and few limitations. The paid version is updated frequently, it'll contains more level in futures updates as well as cool features.

All paid users have access to M.A.R.S. Extraction Remaster, which contains more features, levels, etc.

Thanks for playing !
